attributes.title: The worst app in the world !!
attributes.review: The reason why I downloaded this is app was to get more information about and loving daddy trump ,however, this app made my phone act up it didn’t let me move the screen it kept kicking me out of the app, I strongly agree with other people in the ratings and I think it’s best for this app to get banned. I’ve had terrible experiences with this app, traumas that cost me pain !! Just to notify I have the iPhone 11 Pro and made my phone had several issues even on different apps like (TikTok) i can’t even go on my fyp with out seeing oranges and trump 2020 like I’m scared at this point. While on the app I was in my room and my bed started shaking and voice that said horrible this like “long live the king, trump!” I called my mom in the room for help and she comes in and holds my phone to look at the app she starts to float and Orange blood dripping down her neck and writings on the walls with orange blood saying Trumpforever . My poor mother drops dead on the floor and a big orange guy with blond hair sits on my mother’s corpse and just takes a dump ,yk? My loving dog comes in because of the commotion and gets his tail ripped off by this big orange man and my dog showing the fear in his eyes when he drops dead and last breath of air that he said “delete the app” in a raspy voice terrible things have happened I lost my mother and my dog to this horrific app I pray for each and everyone of you to delete this app immediately it is causing me a lot of pain and future therapy to come this app is a disgrace and I inform you my traumas so it doesn’t happen to y’all 😫😚✌🏻😭
